verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H6215>and<s%>, behold, Esau was <S%H935>coming<s%>, and with him <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>. And he <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H3206>children<s%> unto <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, and unto <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>, and unto the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8198>handmaids<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H8198>handmaids<s%> and their <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H7223>foremost<s%>, and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> and her <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H314>after<s%>, and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H314>hindermost<s%>.

And he himself passed <S%H5674>over<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>, and bowed <S%H7812>himself<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, until he came <S%H5066>near<s%> to his <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to meet <S%H7125>him<s%>, and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> <S%H5307>him<s%>, and fell on his <S%H6677>neck<s%>, and kissed <S%H5401>him<s%>: and they <S%H1058>wept<s%>.

And he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> and the <S%H3206>children<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, Who are <S%H428>these<s%> with <S%H559>thee<s%>? And he said, The <S%H3206>children<s%> whom <S%H430>God<s%> hath graciously <S%H2603>given<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>.
Then the <S%H8198>handmaids<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%>, they and their <S%H3206>children<s%>, and they bowed <S%H7812>themselves<s%>.

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> also and her <S%H3206>children<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%>, and bowed <S%H7812>themselves<s%>: and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>, and they bowed <S%H7812>themselves<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What meanest thou by all this <S%H4264>company<s%> which I <S%H6298>met<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, To <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%>.
And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H7227>enough<s%>, my <S%H251>brother<s%>; let that which thou hast be thine.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4672>Nay<s%>, I pray thee, if now I have found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, then <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H4503>present<s%> at my <S%H3027>hand<s%>; forasmuch as I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, as one seeth the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and thou wast pleased with <S%H7521>me<s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%>, I pray <S%H1293>thee<s%>, my gift that is <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H430>thee<s%>; because God hath dealt graciously with <S%H2603>me<s%>, and <S%H3605>because<s%> I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H3605>enough<s%>. And he <S%H6484>urged<s%> <S%H3947>him<s%>, and he took it.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us take our <S%H5265>journey<s%>, and let us <S%H3212>go<s%>, and I will go before <S%H3212>thee<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H113>him<s%>, My lord <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> that the <S%H3206>children<s%> are <S%H7390>tender<s%>, and that the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds<s%> with me have their <S%H5763>young<s%>: and if they <S%H1849>overdrive<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, all the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Let my <S%H113>lord<s%>, I pray <S%H5674>thee<s%>, pass over <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>: and I will lead <S%H5095>on<s%> <S%H328>gently<s%>, according to the <S%H7272>pace<s%> of the <S%H4399>cattle<s%> that are before <S%H6440>me<s%> and according to the <S%H7272>pace<s%> of the <S%H3206>children<s%>, until I <S%H935>come<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%> unto <S%H8165>Seir<s%>.

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let me now <S%H3322>leave<s%> with thee some of the <S%H5971>folk<s%> that are with <S%H559>me<s%>. And he said, <S%H4100>What<s%> needeth <S%H4672>it<s%>? let me find <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%>.
So <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> on his <S%H1870>way<s%> unto <S%H8165>Seir<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> to <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5521>booths<s%> for his <S%H4735>cattle<s%>: therefore the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in <S%H8004>peace<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, when he <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H6307>Paddan-aram<s%>; and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And he <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H2513>parcel<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%>, where he had <S%H5186>spread<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%>, at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%>, <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%>, for a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H7192>money<s%>.
And he <S%H5324>erected<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and called <S%H7121>it<s%> <S%H415>El-Elohe<s%>-Israel.
